markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Insurgent](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=171)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 48 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

You were more than a rebel; you were a revolutionary, fighting for the promise of a new or better country. You may or may not still believe in the cause, or perhaps victory or exile has led you on this new journey to trumpet your glory... or to escape the consequences of your defeat.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Lengthy Diversion](/Feats.aspx?ID=810) skill feat.
name: Insurgent

text: Insurgent Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 48 2.0 You were more than a rebel; you were a revolutionary, fighting for the promise of a new or better country. You may or may not still believe in the cause, or perhaps victory or exile has led you on this new journey to trumpet your glory... or to escape the consequences of your defeat. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Deception skill, and the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the Lengthy Diversion skill feat.
